mapper.sql: parent_id parentId, assist_product_id assistProductId, order_unit orderUnit, count count, plan_date planDate, state state, cuser cuser, cdate cdate, uuser uuser, udate udate, remark remark, isdisable isdisable, id id

'外协计划id' parentId, '外协件id' assistProductId, '单位id(单据单位)' orderUnit, '计划数量(单据单位)' count, '期望到货日期(yyyy-MM-dd)' planDate, '状态(0:待提交 1:待审核 2:待执行 3:执行中 4:已完成 -1:已取消)' state, '创建用户id' cuser, '创建时间' cdate, '修改用户id' uuser, '修改时间' udate, '备注' remark, '是否启用(0:已禁用 1:启用)' isdisable, 'id' id
mapper.insert: delete from vmes_column where model_code = 'AssistPlanDetail' ; insert into vmes_column ( id,model_code,title_key,title_name,serial_number, isdisable,ishide,isedit,ismust,cdate, cuser ) VALUES (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','parentId','外协计划id',1, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','assistProductId','外协件id',2, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','orderUnit','单位id(单据单位)',3, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','count','计划数量(单据单位)',4, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','planDate','期望到货日期(yyyy-MM-dd)',5, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','state','状态(0:待提交 1:待审核 2:待执行 3:执行中 4:已完成 -1:已取消)',6, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','cuser','创建用户id',7, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','cdate','创建时间',8, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','uuser','修改用户id',9, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','udate','修改时间',10, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','remark','备注',11, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','isdisable','是否启用(0:已禁用 1:启用)',12, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin'), (replace(uuid(), '-', ''),'AssistPlanDetail','id','id',0, '1','1','1','0',now(), 'admin')
